name: Leslie C. Lander
content: Leslie C. Lander - Our Faculty | School of Computing | Binghamton University Skip to main content School of Computing Our Faculty Leslie C. Lander Associate Professor and Graduate Director School of Computing lander@binghamton.edu 607-777-2309 EB P06 BackgroundWebsite: http://www.cs.binghamton.edu/~lander Lander's degrees are in mathematics, and he has taught mathematics in Europe and South America. He started to teach computer science in South America and then came to Binghamton. His main activities are in programming languages and aspects of software engineering. He has published work on the Ada language and chaired the local ACM SigAda Chapter. Current interest is in a variety of programming paradigms, but especially object-oriented programming and design patterns.EducationBA, Cambridge UniversityMSc, PhD, University of LiverpoolResearch InterestsProgramming languagesProgramming paradigmsFormal aspects of software engineeringAwards2013-14: University's Outstanding Graduate Director Award2005-06: Chancellor's Award for Excellence in Faculty Service Return to Top Last Updated: 3/31/25
